jobs.title: Find-A-Doc
jobs.description: Find-A-Doc is a PHP-based website designed to schedule patient appointments with doctors, eliminating the need for patients to call doctors' offices for appointment scheduling.

jobs.title: Bon-Voyage
jobs.description: Bon Voyage! is a MERN-based website centered around Bangladesh that will assist people to plan a trip according to their preferences.

jobs.title: RRF-Restaurant Review Finder
jobs.description: RRF is a PHP-based website centered around Gazipur, designed for reviewing food items and restaurants. It is built to assist users in finding high-quality food items at their preferred restaurants by showcasing a diverse selection of menu offerings and restaurant options, complete with ratings and reviews.
